short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take screenshots and record your screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CaptureIt is a versatile and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to make capturing screenshots a breeze. Whether you need to save an entire webpage, a specific section, or just a visible part of your screen, CaptureIt has you covered. Perfect for professionals, students, and everyday users alike, CaptureIt ensures that you can quickly and easily capture, save, and share your screen moments.

Key Features:

Full Page Capture: Capture an entire webpage, including content below the fold, in one seamless image.
Visible Area Capture: Quickly grab a screenshot of just the visible part of your screen.
Custom Selection: Select and capture any specific area of the webpage.
Easy Sharing: Share your screenshots directly from the extension via email or social media.
High-Quality Images: Save your screenshots in high resolution to ensure every detail is preserved.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple, intuitive design makes taking screenshots quick and hassle-free.
Keyboard Shortcuts: Use customizable shortcuts for even faster access to screenshot features.
